author: Michael McCann
title: Will lawsuit filed against DraftKings and FanDuel make impact? - NFL
text:
by Michael McCann Twitter Email Posted: Thu Oct. 8, 2015
Editorâ€™s note: FanDuel is a sponsor of Sports Illustrated. This piece was pursued and executed independent of that business relationship. Sports Illustrated also has a partnership with DailyMVP, another daily fantasy sports provider.
And so it has begun.
